messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Hello...
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome Moses, I am new as well and hope to learn a great deal.  I want to get an online book discussion going if possible.  If interested email me. My address
messages.messageBody:
Welcome Moses, I am new as well and hope to learn a great deal. I want to
get an online book discussion going if possible. If interested email me.
My address is bkae73@... Take care.

Brian
----- Original Message -----
From: "Moses" <mosesohx@...>
To: "SH" <samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, July 02, 2001 8:46 AM
Subject: [samuraihistory] Hello...


> I just wanted to send out a quick greeting to everyone on the list. My
> name is Moses and I am looking forward to some interesting discussion.
> Up to this point I have only read Hagakure but I am looking to expand my
> knowledge of the samurai as far as is possible.
>
> I am a senior Literature major so any books that you can recommend to me
> I would be more than happy to read. Hoping for good things. Thanks.
>
> Moses
>
> --
> "Of all that is written I love only what a man has written
> with his blood. Write with the blood, and you will
> experience that blood is spirit."---Friedrich Nietzsche
>
> "ATTENTION: KEEP YOUR EYE ON THE DETAILS."---Unknown
>
> "It is spiritless to think that you cannot attain to that which
> you have seen and heard the masters attain. The masters are men.
> You are also a man. If you think that you will be inferior in doing
> something, you will be on that road very soon."---Yamamoto Tsunetomo
>
>
>
>
> Samurai Archives: http://www.hn.org/samurai-archives/index.html
> ---
> To unsubscribe from this group, send an email to:
> samuraihistory-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com
>
>
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>

messages.subject: Hello...
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to send out a quick greeting to everyone on the list.  My name is Moses and I am looking forward to some interesting discussion. Up to this point
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to send out a quick greeting to everyone on the list. My
name is Moses and I am looking forward to some interesting discussion.
Up to this point I have only read Hagakure but I am looking to expand my
knowledge of the samurai as far as is possible.

I am a senior Literature major so any books that you can recommend to me
I would be more than happy to read. Hoping for good things. Thanks.

Moses

--
"Of all that is written I love only what a man has written
with his blood. Write with the blood, and you will
experience that blood is spirit."---Friedrich Nietzsche

"ATTENTION: KEEP YOUR EYE ON THE DETAILS."---Unknown

"It is spiritless to think that you cannot attain to that which
you have seen and heard the masters attain. The masters are men.
You are also a man. If you think that you will be inferior in doing
something, you will be on that road very soon."---Yamamoto Tsunetomo
